title: Tahm Kench without his hat... looks bald...
body: probably one of the more disturbing things i've seen in LoL... he has no hair, and yet he looks bald.

replies.body: Were you expecting a sparse, oily, comb-over under the hat?  * shudders *

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=hsUZXkTt,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-10T16:51:40.577+0000)
>
> Were you expecting a sparse, oily, comb-over under the hat?  * shudders *

http://orig02.deviantart.net/30a8/f/2015/176/1/7/proud_alpha___alpha_crowley_x_omega_reader_by_angelmewmew-d8yojcn.jpg
Come to think of it, hats really should be more popular among deal-making demons. Even those with more hair.

> [{quoted}](name=CupcakeTrap,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=hsUZXkTt,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2015-07-10T18:11:10.815+0000)
>
> http://orig02.deviantart.net/30a8/f/2015/176/1/7/proud_alpha___alpha_crowley_x_omega_reader_by_angelmewmew-d8yojcn.jpg
> Come to think of it, hats really should be more popular among deal-making demons. Even those with more hair.

May I recommend a very fine hat for a fancy gentleman?

http://imgur.com/wMn7pUq

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=hsUZXkTt,comment-id=000300010000,timestamp=2015-07-10T20:23:17.903+0000)
>
> May I recommend a very fine hat for a fancy gentleman?
> 
> http://imgur.com/wMn7pUq

*How did this not occur to me.*

I was like, "Wait, did he ever wear a hat in Supernatural? Maybe. Hmmm. What about in that episode of Doctor Who he was in? Nah, I don't think so. If only there were some other show in which his hat is in fact part of a memorable line of dialogue."
Don't say that! comb-overs are _totally_ coming back into fashion.

> [{quoted}](name=Solideus,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=hsUZXkTt,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-07-10T16:55:02.744+0000)
>
> Don't say that! comb-overs are _totally_ coming back into fashion.

[Not like this it's not!](http://corporatehandyman.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/combover.jpg)  (I hope, I really really hope.)
Looks like a salamander with a catfish beard...which he kinda is.

> [{quoted}](name=Treasure Goblin,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=hsUZXkTt,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-07-09T20:11:48.669+0000)
>
> probably one of the more disturbing things i've seen in LoL... he has no hair, and yet he looks bald.

He looks bald **BECAUSE **he has no hair.
Tahm Kench looks bald because IS BALD.
Cool edit, I personally don't mind him with the bald hatless hook, but I do agree he looks better with it.
